name: Brother Elias
long_description: The priest wears blue robes. He has an air of peace and tranquility about him. Around his neck he wears a heavy silver chain which supports a large silver ankh.

dialogue.greeting: Blessings upon you, traveler. How may I serve you today?
dialogue.default: The divine light watches over all who walk in righteousness.
dialogue.goodbye: May the gods guide your path.
